channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Shutdown tensions cause clashes to erupt on Capitol Hill: "You're an embarrassment"
item.description: Congress erupted into testy confrontations and shouting matches on Wednesday as lawmakers grow increasingly frustrated that the federal government rem...

item.title: How air traffic controllers could help end the shutdown
item.description: This week's air traffic controller shortages could put more pressure on Congress to end the government shutdown, which has controllers working without...

item.title: IRS tells employees furlough backpay guaranteed, while WH counters in memo
item.description: The Internal Revenue Service said in a Wednesday memo that federal workers are required by law to be paid for the period that they're furloughed durin...

item.title: Trump expects Gaza deal soon and may travel to Egypt for signing
item.description: President Trump said Wednesday that "we are very close" to a deal to end the war in Gaza and he may travel to Egypt on Saturday or Sunday if one is ag...

item.title: Mike Johnson faces growing internal revolt over shutdown
item.description: The longer the government stays shut down, the shorter House Republicans' patience seems to be getting with Speaker Mike Johnson (R-La.). Why it matte...

item.title: Tracking who Trump is appointing to fill key administration roles
item.description: Follow President Trump’s progress filling over 800 positions, among about 1,300 that require Senate confirmation, in this tracker from The Washington ...

item.title: Supreme Court grapples with lawsuit challenging mail-in ballot rules
item.description: The question before the justices was a narrow one — whether an Illinois congressman had met the basic legal threshold to bring his lawsuit — not the l...

item.title: Hegseth’s sprawling hunt for Charlie Kirk critics spans nearly 300 investigations
item.description: The inquiry, resulting in a smattering of disciplinary action so far, follows an extraordinary directive aimed at silencing criticism of the slain act...

item.title: Why Democrats are slow-walking their 2024 autopsy until after the November elections
item.description: The party’s chairman has already said it would not include scrutiny of how Joe Biden’s late withdrawal from the race was handled.

item.title: Trump says Chicago mayor, Illinois governor should be jailed for response to ICE
item.description: Trump, providing no evidence, said Brandon Johnson and JB Pritzker should go to jail, accusing the two Democrats of “failing to protect” immigration a...

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
